title: can't use abilities
body:
Sometimes when I enter a game I am unable to cast my abilities using my keys (QWERDF). Relogging fixes it sometimes but other times it doesn't. I would love some help on fixing this.....

It feels like it has been happening more and more lately.

replies.body:
That must be pretty infuriating trying to play but nothing is responding.  :o  You might have a corrupt config, which can happen sometimes or after tryign to make manual modifications.  Unless the keyboard itself is the issue, resetting your config should fix the issue.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that works for you!
